title: User management
body:
as a parking company, we want to manage users in the platform such as municipality admins and police officers as well as other administrators by adding, removing and selecting priviledges for them

- [x] add a general admin user for managing the database [Vincenzo]

- [x] add the ability to insert new parking company administrators [Vincenzo]

- [x] add the ability to insert new municipality administrators [Vincenzo]

- [x] add the ability to insert new police officers [Vincenzo]

- [x] define these as services in the dashboard for parking company [Vincenzo]

title: Dashboard services and management for municipality
body:
As a municipality administrator, i want to access a dashboard page with services for managing sensors, parking places and police officers

- [x] define a service for retrieving a list of police officers [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for adding a new police officer in the system [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for retrieving the list of sensors (of the current municipality) [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for receiving push notifications from installed sensors in parking places [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for retrieiving a single parking place [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for adding a new parking place [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for updating an existing parking place [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for delete an exisiting parking place [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for retreiving a single sensor [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for adding a new sensor [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for updating an existing sensor [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for deleting an exisiting sensor [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service for sending notifications to police officers about parking violations [Vincenzo]

- [ ] display the list of parking places updated in real time in the dashboard [Divya]

- [ ] display the list of police officers updated in real time in the dashboard [Divya]

- [ ] create a form and buttons for adding new parking places [Divya]

- [ ] create a form and buttons for adding new police officers [Divya]

title: Send parking request
body:
As a driver, i want to send a parking place request so that i can book a parking place in the wanted location.

- [x] Learn how to use HTML and JS to build a sampe web page [Divya]

- [x] create a page in app where user can specify location, date, duration and car plate number [Divya]

- [ ] display google map and marker on chosen location [Skipped]

- [x] create a confirmation button in the app [Divya]

- [x] send the request to the api using http post [Divya]

- [x] display a message asking for payment confirmation [Divya]

- [x] create a payment confirmation button [Divya]

title: Platform services
body:
As a parking company we want to expose each service with a REST Api interface so that users can access it via different devices
TECHNOLOGY CHANGE: JAVA > JAVASCRIPT

- [x] Learn how to use nodejs for developing a REST Api [Vincenzo]

- [ ] Learn how to use docker for creating a self-packed application [Skipped]

- [x] Integrate the server api with a PaaS MongoDB [Vincenzo]

- [x] Create a simple request route for testing purposes [Vincenzo]

- [x] Host the api in some cloud platform for easy team developing [Vincenzo]

- [x] Host sample web pages inside the server app [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a payment service for approving requests [Vincenzo]

- [x] integrate a mock payment functionality for approving requests

- [x] Add unit testing for the simple request service [Vincenzo]

title: Notify System status
body:
as a parking company we want to warn users about the status of the service in order to let them know if the service is available or not

- [ ] define procedure for checking health of system

- [ ] create service for returning the status of system

- [ ] display status of system in management pages and app

title: Subscription
body:
as a driver i want to subscribe to the service selecting different tiers in order to obtain discounts and offers for prolonged usage of the service
- [ ] define user schema

- [ ] define user authentication

- [ ] define the exchange protocol between the page and the api service

- [ ] create a button for logging the user in

- [ ] display current offers in app

- [ ] create button for selecting an offer

- [ ] integrate payment and offers selection

- [ ] return confirmation for driver

title: cost per hour management
body:
As a parking company, we want to establish the cost per hour in order to manage the cost for the duration requested

- [ ] design field in management page for changing the cost per hour [Divya]

- [x] store the cost per hour in knowledge base [Vincenzo]

- [x] design service for updating the cost per hour [Vincenzo]

- [x] integrate the service with the payment process [Vincenzo]

title: Alert on time
body:
As a driver, i want to be notified about the time of the parked cars in order to know know how much time i have left.

- [ ] set a countdown timer in the parking app

- [ ] countdown timer starts after parking procedure is completed

- [ ] when time exceeds and car is not removed send notification to Police officers

title: Send feedback
body:
As a driver, i want to send a feedback after using the service in order to file a complaint or express satisfaction.

- [ ] Create task completion display event once the location is reached.

- [ ] create rating input from 1 to 5 stars

- [ ] create a text box under the rating input (For complaints or comments)

- [ ] create a send button for sending feeback to system

title: Send booking receipt
body:
As a parking company, we want to send a confirmation of payment document for a booked parking place, for drivers to show a receipt if problems appear.

- [ ] prepare a document containing user info, booking info and date of payment

- [ ] generate the document after successful payment

- [ ] send the document to user when redirecting to route directions page

title: GPS en route
body:
As a driver, i want to display the route to the parking place in order to know where to park.

- [x] learn about google maps GPS services [Vincenzo]

- [x] define sensor database schema

- [x] create some sensor mocks in db

- [x] define parking place database schema

- [x] create some mock parking places in db

- [x] geolocate the user from his/her before him/her sending the request

- [x] after payment confirmation display route to destination in a map [Vincenzo]

title: Receive new job
body:
As a police officer, i want to get notified about a parking violation in order to go there and process removal of the car.

- [ ] Receive Notification message through the application 

- [ ] Set the status of the assigned task to complete or on going

title: Municipality web page
body:
As a municipality, we want to access a  management web page to manage places, officers and sensors.

- [x] create a service retrieving a web page for municipality users [Vincenzo]

- [x] design database schema for municipality users [Vincenzo]

- [x] create a rest service for adding and removing users [Vincenzo]

- [x] create an authentication method between municipality users and application [Vincenzo]

- [x] create a login page authenticating users in the process [Divya]

- [x] create dashboard page for management of municipality [Divya]

title: Receive plate number from sensors
body:
As a municipality, we want to receive plate number from sensors in order to check if the parking car is legit or not.

- [x] design Database schema to store the data from Sensors [Vincenzo]

- [x] create the sensor class to simulate a real sensor [Vincenzo]

- [x] make the sensor class send random events simulating detection of cars [Vincenzo]

- [x] define a service in which sensors will write their plate recognition and status [Vincenzo]

- [x] if any mismatch is found automatically warn the nearest officer [Vincenzo]

title: extend time of parking
body:
As a parking company,we want to allow drivers to extend their parking time in order to make them able to stay for longer time if needed.

- [ ] Create app notification before 15 minutes of the requested duration

- [ ] Add a option in the notification to extend the service for drivers

- [ ] If extension is required route to the payment page

- [ ] If no response after the duration send a notification to municipality

title: Dashboard services for parking company
body:
As a parking company,we want to access a management page for the system in order to play maintenance and check system status.

- [ ] create a service retrieving a web page for parking company users

- [ ] design database schema for parking company users

- [ ] design database schema for users using the system (municipality)

- [ ] design database schema for locations

- [ ] correlate users and locations

- [ ] create tables and stored procedures for adding and removing users

- [ ] create an authentication method between  users and system

- [ ] create dashboard page for management of system and statistical usage

- [ ] web page must display locations, users, parking places

title: Drivers tracking
body:
As a parking company,we want the system to automatically change parking place after trip is started so that drivers will park in the best place according to their location.

- [ ] Continuously receive current GPS location from drivers

- [ ] if nearest parking place frees in specified location, re-asses the GPS route

title: Payment options
body:
As a parking company,we want to allow drivers to select a payment service in order get payment through different options.

- [ ] Retrieve payment information from user google account

- [ ] Integrate credit card payment

- [ ] Integrate Paypal payment
